countdown.until: left until the moment when our life paths intertwine forever, bound by firm and unconditional love.
countdown.after: passed, since we promised ourselves to each other.

hero.headline1: With hearts overflowing with joy and boundless happiness, we warmly invite you to join us on the day when our love will be crowned and sealed in marriage.

headline.main: We look forward to your confirmation

problem.headline: You don't see the Google Form?
problem.text: We're sorry, something went wrong. Please try this link

routeSM.headline: Top Gear villa Jugovo S
routeSM.0: After the church wedding continue straightforward through the Zoran Djindjic Boulevard. At the third traffic light intersection nearby Belgrade (basketball) Arena turn right.
routeSM.2: Pass one traffic light intersection, enter the roundabout over the highway, take the third exit and enter the highway in the direction of the city centre / Niš /Skoplje.
routeSM.3a: Continue straightforwardly and exit the city.
routeSM.3b: After some  20 min of ride or 26 km from the groom‘s home pass the toll station Belgrade (in the Vrčin district).
routeSM.5a: Enter the closed part of the A1 / E75 highway.
routeSM.5b: After passing the “Jerina” motel, located 52 km from the groom’s home or 26 km from the toll station “Belgrade”, take the exit “Vodanj” following the sign “Smederevo Center.”
routeSM.10: After passing the “Vodanj” toll station, turn right, following the signs for “Smederevo” and “Vodan”j, and continue over the bridge crossing the highway.
routeSM.12: Continue straight ahead through the villages of Vodanj and Petrijevo until you reach the first roundabout.
routeSM.13: At the roundabout in the village of Petrijevo, take the third exit, following the sign “Grocka,” and keep driving straight for approximately 5.5 km, until you reach the Danube River.
routeSM.15: At the intersection in front of the Danube river, turn right.
routeSM.17: The villa “Jugovo S” will be on your left-hand side, approximately 1.4 km or 2 minutes ride after the last intersection.

routeSV.headline: Top Gear Belgrade - Svilajnac
routeSV.0a: Gathering of the wedding guests at the groom’s home. Address: Bulevar Zorana Đinđića 123đ, 11070 Belgrade
routeSV.0b: The streets where you can park your vehicle are marked red. The orange dot marks the place where the wedding queue is going to be made.
routeSV.3: After  gathering at the groom‘s home turn right and continue straightforward through the Zoran Djindjic Boulevard. At the third traffic light intersection nearby Belgrade (basketball) Arena turn right.
routeSV.5: Pass one traffic light intersection, enter the roundabout over the highway, take the third exit and enter the highway in the direction of the city centre / Niš /Skoplje.
routeSV.6a: Continue straightforwardly and exit the city.
routeSV.6b: After some  20 min of ride or 26 km from the groom‘s home pass the toll station Belgrade (in the Vrčin district).
routeSV.8a: Enter the closed part of the A1 / E75 highway.
routeSV.8b: Some 94 km from the groom‘s home or 68 km from the Belgrade toll station, exit the highway at the toll station „Velika Plana“. You will find that  toll station  after you pass the rest area with the Gazprom gas/fuel station and the Mc Donald’s restaurant.
routeSV.14: After passing the toll station, turn right at the first crossing and continue straightforwardly on the bridge over the highway which you have just exited.
routeSV.15: Immediately after the bridge turn right following the signs for Svilajnac and the ethno village ,,Moravski konaci“.
routeSV.16: Continue straightforwardly until the T-crossing and there turn left, following the sign for the ethno village ,,Moravski konaci“.
routeSV.17: Follow the main road, pass the customs storage ,,Velika Plana“, cross the bridge over the Velika Morava river, pass through the village of Donja Livadica and continue straightforwardly until you reach the village of Žabari. In the centre of that village turn right following the sign for Svilajnac.
routeSV.19a: Follow the main road passing through the villages of Gornja Livadica, Porodin and Kušiljevo. Afterwards you will enter Svilajnac driving by the car wash ,,Raša i Aca“ and the ,,Neša Komerc“ ceramics store on your right, i.e. the ,,Exclusive“ restaurant and the ,,Svetofor“ store on your left.
routeSV.19b: After entering Svilajnac, follow the street until the town centre, follow the sharp curve direction left (you will also notice a monument on your left dedicated to the First World War fighters and liberators from this county), and continue straightforwardly at the first crossing.
routeSV.20: Some 20 seconds after that crossing, you will reach the bride’s home.

404.headline: Whoops-a-daisy!
404.statement: Well, well, well... it appears you've succeeded in surprising us and misplacing a page in the process! How about enjoying a relaxed walk back to our lovely home page?
